00004 string DbConnections::SearchConnection(string DbValue,DB& B,int Type,string Value)
00005 {
00006     for(int i=0; i<DbValue.length(); i++)
00007     {
00008         if((int)DbValue.find("^(",i)>=0 && (int)DbValue.find(",",i)>=0 && (int)DbValue.find(")",i)>=0)
00009         {
00010             int a = (int)DbValue.find("^(",i)+2,b = (int)DbValue.find(",",i),c = (int)DbValue.find(")",i),d,e;
00011             istringstream k (DbValue.substr(a,(b-a)));
00012             istringstream z(DbValue.substr(b+1,(c-(b+1))));
00013             k >> d;
00014             z >>e;
00015             if (Type ==1)
00016                 return GetNormalConnect(d,e,B);
00017             else
00018                 SetNormalConEntry(Value,B,d,e);
00019         }
00020         if((int)DbValue.find("#(")>=0 &&  (int)DbValue.find(",",i)>=0 && (int)DbValue.find(",|",i)>=0 && (int)DbValue.find("|)",i)>=0)
00021         {
00022             int a = (int)DbValue.find("#(",i)+2,b = (int)DbValue.find(",",i),c = (int)DbValue.find(",|",i),d,e;
00023             istringstream k (DbValue.substr(a,(b-a)));
00024             istringstream z(DbValue.substr(b+1,(c-(b+1))));
00025             string p = DbValue.substr(c+2,(int)DbValue.find("|)")-(c+2));
00026             k >> d;
00027             z >>e;
00028             if (Type ==1)
00029                 return BetweenConnect(p,d,e,B);
00030             else
00031                 SetBettwenConEntry(Value,d,e,p);
00032         }
00033     }
00034     if (Type == 2) return "NO_TO_SET";
00035     else
00036         return DbValue;

00038 string DbConnections::GetNormalConnect(int X, int Y,DB B)
00039 {
00040     if(B.GetMaxX()>=X and B.GetMaxY()>=Y and (B.PosX!=X or B.PosY!=Y))
00041     {
00042         return B.GetEntryById(X,Y);
00043     }
00044     else return " ";
00045 }
00046 string DbConnections::BetweenConnect(string Path,int X,int Y, DB B)
00047 {
00048     DB x(Path);
00049     if(x.GetMaxX()>=X and x.GetMaxY()>=Y  and Path!=B.GetPathName())
00050     {
00051         return x.GetEntryById(X,Y);
00052     }
00053     else return " ";
00054 }
00055 void DbConnections::SetNormalConEntry(string Value,DB& B,int X,int Y)
00056 {
00057     if(B.GetMaxX()>=X and B.GetMaxY()>=Y)
00058     {
00059         B.SetEntryById(X,Y,Value);
00060     }
00061 }
00062 void DbConnections::SetBettwenConEntry(string Value,int X,int Y,string Path)
00063 {
00064     DB B(Path);
00065     if(B.GetMaxX()>=X and B.GetMaxY()>=Y)
00066     {
00067         B.SetEntryById(X,Y,Value);
00068     }
00069 }
